entry.title: no angels could beckon me back.
entry.summary:
Author: dylaesthetics

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,605Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: Is Buck attracted to him? Or is this some fluke?He prays it’s the first thing, approaching the door to the stall and knocking on it.“Can I come in?”A pause. All Eddie can hear is his restless heart.“C-come in?” Buck echoes, stuttering. His feet shuffle.“Yeah,” says Eddie. “I could help you.”It must be those tequila shots. Maybe they were spiked, because Eddie’s lost his mind.Buck doesn’t make a noise for so long that panic bubbles in Eddie’s chest, making him all hot and sweaty for more than one reason. He starts stepping away from the door, trying to make sense of how he could come back from implying what he did without ruining their friendship.But, turns out, Buck’s on board with ruining said friendship.For, just as Eddie’s about to leave the bathroom, he hears the clink of a door unlocking.____OR Buck wants to party with Eddie and ends up partying…Well, erm, hard.

entry.title: The History of Cinnamon Sorrow
entry.summary:
Author: ElvenSorceress

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 107,927Chapters: 11/12Kudos: 203

Summary: “Now that you’re here, we should discuss Christopher staying with us for the foreseeable future. It would be so much better for him. He should be able to have a mother’s care. I’m really the only mother he’s ever known.”Eddie rankles at the words. But knew she’d say it. He’s so fucking tired.He can’t even imagine what his mother would say if she knew Eddie was in love with a man and that Chris will probably never have any mother except Shannon. “I was guessing Chris will want to stay where he is. For now. I don’t want to uproot him. Not when he’s happy and doing well.”She actually smiles this time. For real. “That’s a very caring, wise decision. I’m proud of you.”God. Fucking god. It hurts but it also feels like a rush of hope and Eddie could scream. Or cry. Or both. And doesn’t know which he should do, but he’s definitely dangling over a 5000 foot cliff somewhere. Why does something he inexplicably wants so badly make him feel like such shit?~Eddie arrives in El Paso to mend his family and confront his childhood.

entry.title: Those he left behind
entry.summary:
Author: DaniWib

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,378Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 472

Summary: All Buck wanted was to be with his family, but things weren’t the same after the lawsuit. He was sidelined, buried in chores, still on the outs with the 118, especially Bobby and Eddie. Unwilling to give up on them, Buck kept his head down and did his job.Until he died, all alone, while his team was out on a call.Grief and guilt consume them. They should have been there, should have seen the signs— should have saved him. But Bobby had let his anger blind him, believing there’d be time to make things right. And Eddie had stayed silent, convinced there’d be a someday. Now, Buck is gone, and they can never make it right.They weren’t the only ones Buck left behind, however. When a group of Navy SEALs arrives at Buck’s funeral, their presence brings more than just surprise. It brings truths the 118 never saw coming, and more grief than they ever could have imagined.[Fic is complete and will be updated weekly on Sunday nights, AEST]

entry.title: and i need you now tonight (and i need you more than ever)
entry.summary:
Author: bsnprnt

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,104Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 115

Summary: Eddie exhales, ragged. “And maybe I’m a coward for only saying it now. But I—I’ll say it over and over again, I think I’ll say it until the day I die. I’m fucking in love with you, Buck. And if I sit here and watch you marry someone else without telling you that, I’ll regret it for the rest of my life.”Everyone in the venue is dead silent, looking between the two of them in quiet shock. Buck doesn’t move. Tommy stares at him, blinking slowly, almost in disbelief.Eddie stands alone in the aisle, waiting—his heart in his throat, the truth finally out, and no idea what comes next. But he knows he has to ask.“Choose me.”Or,Eddie has the worst day of his life before he decides to object at his best friend’s wedding.

entry.title: Are those real stars that hang in the sky?
entry.summary:
Author: AccioPav

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,649Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: Buck had a friend that only he could see for as long as he could remember. They shared thoughts, they shared feelings, and they shared the need to protect those important to them. His parents, however, told him it wasn't normal, wasn't right--they told him to stop pretending. Pretending would mean Danny wasn't real, though, which they very much were. He stopped talking about Danny around them, learned to push his friend away at times, and took the pills his parents gave him in the hopes he'd be a perfect, normal, child. Life at the 118 is anything but normal and that's the way Buck prefers it. He has a purpose and he has a family, even if they don't know about Danny. Then Maddie tells him she invited their parents to visit and the secret Buck has worked so hard to keep is pulled to the light, along with one his family has been keeping as well.An AU where Daniel's spirit connects itself to Buck at his birth. Goes through a few major Buck events in the earlier seasons, before diverging from canon during the Buckley family visit during Season 4 (i.e. Buck Begins).

entry.title: Growing Together, Hand in Hand
entry.summary:
Author: Idachen

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,339Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Buck 1.0 was impulsive, wildly charismatic, and, let’s be honest, extremely sexually active. Everyone knew that.What no one really knew, though, was that Buck had always been that way—well, at least since Maddie had left. Not since he was twelve, obviously, but by the time he was fourteen, he'd had his first time, and by sophomore year, he’d already hooked up with about half of his grade and a good third of the grade below.And this is important to understand. Because if you don’t get that about Buck, it won’t make much sense why what happened next wasn’t really all that surprising.orA crazy story in which BUck first finds out how he can take care of his daughter who shows up at his place from one day to the next and later how he can become a family with his new handsome neighbor, who also seems to be his colleague, and his adorable child.

entry.title: Allergic to Everything Except You
entry.summary:
Author: EddiCoco

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,023Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 84

Summary: When LA's pollen apocalypse turns Evan "Buck" Buckley into a sniffling, sneezing disaster, Eddie Diaz's decade of repressed pining erupts in a flurry of over-the-top acts of service—homemade soup, strategically placed tissues, and a donut rescue mission that would make Romeo blush. Too bad Buck’s allergy-addled brain can’t tell the difference between friendship and flirtation.Cue the 118’s most chaotic intervention yet, complete with confetti cannons, rooftop confessions, and Christopher Diaz’s exasperated verdict that this romance has been obvious since the Obama administration.

entry.title: The Gravity of Us
entry.summary:
Author: Sand9

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,866Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: When Christopher Diaz admits he doesn’t like Ana Flores, Buck and Eddie’s carefully balanced world begins to unravel. Amidst Eddie’s attempts to navigate a fledgling relationship with Ana, Buck’s unwavering presence in Christopher’s life—and Eddie’s own heart—becomes impossible to ignore. Jealousy, misunderstandings, and years of unspoken longing collide, forcing Eddie to confront the truth: the family he’s been searching for has always been right in front of him.

entry.title: Viral Valor: Five Alarms and a Lifeline
entry.summary:
Author: Glovvfish

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,744Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: Eddie Diaz never asked to become the internet’s favorite firefighter. It starts with a car crash, a starstruck teenager, and a poorly timed selfie. Suddenly, “LAFD Updates Man” is trending, and Eddie’s face is everywhere—from rescues gone memetic to a cat-related TikTok sensation.Between dodging photo requests mid-emergency and enduring the 118’s relentless teasing, Eddie’s ready to quit social media for good. But when a viral moment collides with a life-or-death crisis, he’s forced to confront the chaos—and the unexpected ways his online persona has touched lives.With Buck by his side, Eddie learns that even accidental fame can spark hope.

entry.title: And We Are Beginning

entry.title: [podfic] have, hold
entry.summary:
Author: be_brave13

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “I think you should marry me,” Buck says. Still not really looking at Eddie. Looking at Eddie.Condensation drips on his thumb. He got back from Texas seven hours ago. He's known the man at his table for as many years. He doesn't- he's not- but who else is he ever going to love this much? And if Buck asks for something he needs- what is Eddie going to do besides his best to provide it? So: “Okay,” Eddie says. “Okay.”podfic length: 16:41

entry.title: pretend we're in love
entry.summary:
Author: buckemdiaz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,552Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: “I have to go to a wedding,” he says, voice tight. Eddie’s eyebrows scrunch in confusion. That’s it?“You love weddings.”“Not this one. It’s in Pennsylvania. With my mom and dad. For a whole week,” he says, frustration evident in his tone.Well that makes a lot more sense. Buck at home for a whole week? Brutal.“Maddie, Chim and Jee are going, right?” Eddie asks.Buck nods jerkily. “Mmhm. They are. I-It’s just that my parents are expecting me to bring someone and when I don’t, because who the fuck would I ask to suffer for a week for me, they’re going to make comments about how I am going to be alone forever and it-it’s just already on my nerves and I still have nearly three weeks before I even have to go,” he rushes out, abandoning his coffee on the table as he paces back and forth in the kitchen.“I’ll come with you,” Eddie offers. He blinks – he hadn’t exactly thought that one through, but he doesn’t regret it, doesn’t want to take it back. Buck freezes where he’s at, body still as a statue as his head whips to look at Eddie. - or; buck and eddie fake date

entry.title: The Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: bvddiesbro

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,532Chapters: 10/20Kudos: 667

Summary: Evan "Buck" Buckley thought he had left his past behind when he traded his Navy fatigues for turnouts. For years, he’s buried the memories—of war zones, of a lost lover, of the life he swore he'd never return to. But when a series of arson attacks target classified SCIF sites across Los Angeles, his past comes back to haunt him.NCIS are called to investigate and Buck’s carefully constructed web of lies begins to crack when Special Agent Sam Hanna arrives at Station 118—because Buck knows him. Sam was once his teammate, his mentor and his sudden reappearance is no coincidence.When a grainy surveillance video reveals a face Buck thought he’d never see again, the ground shifts beneath his feet. Zack, the man he mourned, the man he watched die, is alive.Working alongside NCIS and his old SEAL Team, Buck finds himself walking a dangerous tightrope. The deeper he gets, the more he risks everything—his job, his family, his friendships and the life he’s built with Eddie and Christopher.But secrets can’t stay buried forever.
